mapper.select: select reportNo ,userId ,reportRegDate ,reportType,uniqueNo,processState from report order by reportRegDate desc LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{param1}
select reportNo ,userId ,reportRegDate ,reportType,uniqueNo,processState from report where processState = #{param1} order by reportRegDate desc LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{param2}
select count(reportNo)/10 from report where processState = #{param1}
select reportNo ,userId ,reportRegDate ,reportType,uniqueNo,processState from report where uniqueNo = #{param1} and reportType="글" order by reportRegDate desc LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{param2}
select reportNo ,userId ,reportRegDate ,reportType,uniqueNo,processState from report where uniqueNo = #{param1} and reportType="댓글" order by reportRegDate desc LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{param2}
select count(reportNo)/10 from report where uniqueNo = #{param1}

select r.reportNo, r.userId , r.uniqueNo , r.reportRegDate , r.reportContent , g.userId as reportuser , g.blockState as reportstate from report r left join groupbuyingpost g on r.uniqueNo =g.gbNo where r.reportNo = #{param1}

select r.reportNo, r.userId , r.uniqueNo , r.reportRegDate , r.reportContent , c.userId as reportuser , c.commState as reportstate from report r left join groupbuyingcomment c on r.uniqueNo =c.commNo where r.reportNo = #{param1}
